spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall zoning roughly matches (kitchen left, stairs left, open living/dining right, bathroom near center), but multiple plan-to-render mismatches occur: several exterior/interior doors from the 2D plan are missing or relocated, window locations/counts do not match, and the central bathroom/vestibule region proportions and wall runs differ (extra/shifted partitions and altered corridor geometry).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness appears generally consistent and geometry is coherent, but fidelity to the 2D structure is reduced by missing/changed openings, an apparent omission of the small 3'x2' space below the bathroom, altered adjacency at the kitchen-hall interface (door replaced by open passage/shifted wall), and hallucinated exterior openings on the left wall.

furniture_mapping.notes: The 2D plan does not specify furniture, so exact mapping cannot be verified. Furniture in the render is plausible for the living/dining area, but scale and placement cannot be confirmed against the plan; some circulation clearances appear tight around the dining set and central partitions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric view is clear and readable; lighting is soft and consistent; geometry is mostly clean. Minor issues: some shapes (stairs/inner partitions) look simplified/blocky relative to architectural detail; projection is perspective-isometric rather than strict orthographic isometric.

detected_errors.description: Missing exterior double-door/opening on the top wall in the dining room area shown in the 2D plan.
Missing exterior door on the left wall into/near the kitchen as shown in the 2D plan.
Entrance door placement does not match the 2D plan (plan shows centered on bottom wall; render places it noticeably right of center).
Interior door between kitchen and adjacent hall/living zone in the 2D plan is not represented as a door in the render (appears as an open passage/changed opening condition).
Missing the small 3' x 2' room/vestibule space beneath the bathroom indicated in the 2D plan.
Window placement/count mismatch on the right and bottom facades versus the 2D plan (render shows fewer/different-sized windows than the plan indicates).
Hallucinated narrow vertical windows on the left exterior wall (present in render but not indicated in the 2D plan).
Central partition/wall alignment differs around the bathroom and adjacent corridor (extra/shifted walls relative to the 2D plan).
Proportion distortion in the central core: bathroom and adjacent circulation/partition sizes do not preserve the compact dimensions implied by the 2D plan.
